name: Dungeon Delve (lihas462)
description:
Dungeon Delve is a top-down dungeon crawler where you defeat enemies, level up and survive. How long can you last?

How to play: Use your mouse to move around your sword. Click to attack, right click to stab. When you kill enemies, they drop coins that can be used in the shop, as well as give you experience. If you get enough experience, you level up and gain an ability. Have fun!
